data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Jammu that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Jammu, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Jammu, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 16,830 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Jammu who will make disciples who make disciples.

Jesus, I pray that all the Gardi (Hindu traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Gardi (Hindu traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Gardi (Hindu traditions) people is yours.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Jammu, Jammu and Kashmir, India to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Jammu, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.section_summary:
the county of Jammu, Jammu and Kashmir, India has a population of 1,530,000.

We estimate Jammu has 16,830 people who might know Jesus, 18,564 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,494,606 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the county of Jammu, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

location.name: Jammu
location.people_groups_list: Budhan (Hindu traditions), Brahmin Dakaut, Nai (Sikh traditions), Rajput Halbani
